AT.name: Revenant Saga
AT.description: Werde zu einem Revenant und finde die Wahrheit jenseits von Rache in diesem Gothic-Fantasy-RPG mit atemberaubenden 3D-Schlachten! Nachdem er in ein unsterbliches Wesen namens „Revenant“ verwandelt wurde und von der Existenz eines ihm innewohnenden Dämons erfuhr, begibt sich Albert auf eine Reise, um die dafür verantwortliche Person mit ihrem eigenen Leben bezahlen zu lassen. Während er auf seinem Weg andere trifft, die sich mit ihren eigenen bildhaften Dämonen herumschlagen, welche Antwort wird er da finden...? Dies ist ein Titel, den man nicht verpassen sollte! Er bietet eine herausragende Geschichte, welche die Grenze zwischen Gut und Böse verschwimmen lässt und verfügt über reichlich Content. Darunter eine Vielzahl einzigartiger Subquests, In-Battle Verwandlungssysteme, sowie ein Waffenschmiedesystem, das es Spielern erlaubt, völlig einzigartige Waffen für den Einsatz in rundenbasierten Schlachten mit 3D-Animationen herzustellen!

AU.name: Revenant Saga
AU.description: Become a Revenant and find the truth beyond revenge in this gothic fantasy RPG with stunning 3D battles! After being turned into an immortal being known as a "Revenant" and learning of the existence of a demon within him, Albert sets out on a journey to make the person who did this to him pay with their very life. However, as he runs into others along the way dealing with their own figurative demons, what is the answer he finds...? Boasting a story that blurs the lines between good and evil, and plenty of content to go around, this is one title not to be missed! This includes a variety of unique subquests, in-battle transformation systems, as well as a weapon forging system allowing players to make entirely unique weapons as they battle in turn-based battles with 3D animation!

BG.name: Revenant Saga
BG.description: Become a Revenant and find the truth beyond revenge in this gothic fantasy RPG with stunning 3D battles! This includes a variety of unique subquests, in-battle transformation systems, as well as a weapon forging system allowing players to make entirely unique weapons as they battle in turn-based battles with 3D animation!

BE.name: Revenant Saga
BE.description: Devenez un Revenant et trouvez la vérité au-delà de la revanche dans ce jeu de rôle gothique fantastique avec des batailles 3D étonnantes ! Après avoir été transformé en un être immortel connu sous le nom de 'Revenant' et en apprenant l'existence d'un démon en lui, Albert entreprend un voyage pour faire payer à la personne qui lui a fait cela avec sa propre vie. Cependant, quelle est la réponse qu'il trouve ? Avec une histoire qui brouille les lignes entre le bien et le mal, et beaucoup de contenu à parcourir, c'est un titre à ne pas manquer ! Cela comprend une variété de sous-quêtes uniques, des systèmes de transformation pendant le combat, ainsi qu'un système de forgeage d'armes permettant aux joueurs de fabriquer des armes tout à fait exclusives alors qu'ils se battent dans des batailles au tour par tour avec animation 3D !

ES.name: Revenant Saga
ES.description: ¡Conviértete en un Revenant y descubre la verdad más allá de la venganza en un juego de rol fantástico y con animaciones y combates en 3D! Después de haberse convertido en un ser inmortal conocido como "Revenant", y después de haber descubierto estar poseído por un demonio, Albert se pone en camino para encontrar al culpable de su transformación y para vengarse. Sin embargo, el encuentro con otros personajes, a su vez endemoniados, le llevará una respuesta inimaginable... ¡Revenant Saga se caracteriza por una historia que se juega entre la línea del bien y del mal, y por otros muchos factores que no te puedes perder! La variedad de subquest es única y tanto el sistema de transformación durante los combates como la posibilidad de forjar nuevas armas te permiten experiencias de combate creativas que aprovechan plenamente las animaciones clásicas en 3D.

IT.name: Revenant Saga
IT.description: Diventa un Revenant e scopri la verità oltre la vendetta in un gioco di ruolo fantasy con animazioni e combattimenti in 3D! Dopo essere stato tramutato in un essere immortale conosciuto come "Revenant" e dopo aver scoperto di essere posseduto da un demone che abita in lui, Albert si mette in viaggio per trovare il colpevole di queste trasformazioni e vendicarsi. Tuttavia, l'incontro con altri personaggi, ciascuno con un proprio demone, lo porterà a trovare una risposta inimmaginabile... Revenant Saga si qualifica non solo per una una storia che si gioca tra la linea del bene e del male, ma per tanti altri contenuti da non perdere! La varietà di subquest è unica e il sistema di trasformazione durante i combattimenti, e la possibilità di forgiare nuove armi ti permettono esperienze di combattimento creative che sfruttano in pieno le animazioni classiche in 3D!

This includes a variety of unique subquests, in-battle transformation systems, as well as a weapon forging system allowing players to make entirely unique weapons as they battle in turn-based battles with 3D animation!

PT.name: Revenant Saga
PT.description: Torne-se um Revenant e descubra a verdade para além da vingança nessa fantasia gótica RPG com incríveis batalhas 3D! Após ser transformado num ser imortal conhecido como Revenant e saber da existência de um demônio dentro de si, Albert parte numa jornada para fazer com que a pessoa responsável pague com sua vida. Porém, quando encontra no caminho outros lidando com seus próprios demônios figurados, qual a resposta que encontra...? Exibindo uma história que dilui as divisões entre bem e mal, e com bastante conteúdo disponível, esse é um título a não perder! Inclui uma variedade única de missões secundárias, sistemas de transformação em batalha, bem como um sistema de armamento que permite aos jogadores fazer armas totalmente únicas enquanto lutam em batalhas por turnos com animação 3D!

RU.name: Revenant Saga
RU.description: Стань Ревенантом и познай истину за пределами мести в готической фэнтезийной ролевой игре с битвами в 3D! По превращению в бессмертных существо, известное как "Ревенант", Альберт обнаруживает в себе демона; одержимый жаждой мести, он отправляется на поиски виновника. Однако по мере того, как Альберт встречают других людей, борющихся со своими собственными "демонами", конечный ответ на его проблемы начинает менять форму... Множество разнообразных побочных заданий, боевые трансформации, система крафтинга, позволяющая игрокам создавать уникальное оружие для пошаговых сражений в 3D - всё это и многое другое упаковано в увлекательную историю с размытой гранью между добром и злом.

SE.name: Revenant Saga
SE.description: Become a Revenant and find the truth beyond revenge in this gothic fantasy RPG with stunning 3D battles! After being turned into an immortal being known as a "Revenant" and learning of the existence of a demon within him, Albert sets out on a journey to make the person who did this to him pay with their very life. However, as he runs into others along the way dealing with their own figurative demons, what is the answer he finds...? Boasting a story that blurs the lines between good and evil, and plenty of content to go around, this is one title not to be missed!
